page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: There are no nursery schools in this area but{play schools}organised and run by volunteers and financed by jumble sales, coffee mornings etc. are held at Wearhead and St.John's Chapel.The{primary school at Wearhead} has at present 32 pupils. The staff consists of a headmaster, 1 full-time and 1 part-time assistant.{School {meals}are brought by van from the school kitchen at Stanhope. Some children living in the area attend the {primary school at St.John's Chapel.}At {11+}the children transfer to{Wolsing- {ham Comprehensive School,}taken 14 miles each way by bus. The nearest {Technical College}is at Bishop Auck- land. Durham County's Weardale House {Field Study Centre}for schools and youth organisations is at Ireshope- burn. An{adult course}in Literature is held weekly at Newhouse in winter.
